name: alberta
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a province (= one of the areas that a country is divided into as part of the organization of its government, with some control over its own laws) of western Canada, whose capital city is Edmonton: She was born in 1907 in Alberta, Canada. They arrived in the Alberta capital late Tuesday afternoon.
More examplesFewer examplesHe came from Alberta, where he had a very distinguished medical career.The rush to develop the oil fields in northern Alberta has attracted oil companies from around the world.Overall, home ownership remains affordable in Alberta.
